title: WIPO Publications
cleaned_text: The WIPO publications collection features a wide range of knowledge products - from annual reports, economic research and statistical analysis to general guides, introductory overviews and practical manuals. All our publications are open access, free to download, and offered in multiple languages. Search our collection of current titles here. Drawing on the expertise of IP professionals, scientists, researchers, data analysts and lawyers, our publications are a reliable source for experts and policy makers. They can also help the layperson better understand the intricacies of IP rights and IP law. The WIPO Magazine is part of our collection of publications. Issued four times a year, its articles take a fresh look at creativity and innovation across the world.
